Label: Narrative
Text: The MOVING reference member state of this VC (Value Chain) is ROMANIA. The reference MOVING Card ID of this VC is VC 07 RO.   The reference mountain chain of this VC is Southern Romanian Carpathian Mountains. The reference mountain landscape of this VC is Braşov county. Braşov county is a hilly mountainous region (500 - 2000 metres altitude) located in the south-eastern part of Transylvania. The relief is a diverse mix of mountainous (35%), hilly (50%) and lower altitude plain areas (15%) with an associated land use of forests (mainly in the mountain areas), permanent grasslands (mainly in the hilly areas), cultivated arable fields (in the hilly areas and lower altitude plains and hill areas) plus some urban, industrial and water surfaces (lakes and reservoirs).   The size of the area (km2) is 5363. The minimum altimetry of the LAU (Local Administrative Unit) is unspecified. The maximum altimetry of the LAU is unspecified. The total population (in thousand) is 552.193. The population density (Inhabitants/km2) in the LAU is 103.60. The population change rate of the LAU in the last 10 years (%) is unspecified. The overall regional population density (Inhabitants/km2) is 68.2. The regional population change rate in the last 10 years (%) has been -0.90%.   The average per capita income (EUR/year) [Province] is 12600. The total Gross Value Added (GVA) (EUR million/year) [Province] is 6259.84. The primary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 2.40%. The secondary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 35.80%. The tertiary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 61.80%. The per capita income (EUR/year) [Region] is 10000. The total Gross Value Added (GVA) (EUR million/year) [Region] is 21007.63. The primary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 4.40%. The secondary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 38.20%. The tertiary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 57.40%.   The total number of bed places (BPs) in tourist accommodations/year in the LAU (Local Administrative Unit) is 17795. The regional (Region) share of total BPs/year is 39.20%. The number of agricultural holdings in the LAU is 47980. The nearest settlement with population over 100000 (km) is unspecified. In this region protected areas are present.   The primary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is 8.80%. The secondary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is 40.30%. The tertiary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is 51.20%. The primary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 9.90%. The secondary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 42.20%. The tertiary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 48.00%.   Provision of public goods through the traditional management of semi-natural grasslands (pastures and meadows) with high biodiversity and landscape value.   N/A. Overall the type of challenge faced by this VC is Current and Predicted. This VC is classified as Traditional and Innovative.   The type of innovation of this VC (Value Chain) is unspecified. The innovation is related to the whole VC. The land use systems involved are Grassland. The local assets include Natural.
